title: (x) Carlton Woods Creekside - (similar to) Classic Roman, Adobe Garamond, Sackers Gothic {Patricia}
content:
Hereâ€™s another one. Do any of these fonts look familiar

| --- | --- |
| [carlton.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042514/http:/typophile.com/files/carlton.jpg) | 99.12 KB |
author: evan

comments.content:
The Woodlands is Sackers/Engravers Gothic (slightly squooshed)

Creekside looks like Garamond Bold (Adobe perhaps) slightly extended.

Carlton Woods may have started out as Classic Roman but it looks like it was mashed with another font.
